itunes:summary:
Derek Weida explains the story on how he met his videographer Owen and how their professional careers developed side-by-side, Owen explains why joining the military made him a better person and helped build his understanding of the world, and Owen explains how he transitioned from the farming business to the video/film business.

description:
Derek Weida explains the story on how he met his videographer Owen and how their professional careers developed side-by-side, Owen explains why joining the military made him a better person and helped build his understanding of the world, and Owen explains how he transitioned from the farming business to the video/film business.
